name: The Naked Truth
writer: Carter Bays (created by), Craig Thomas (created by), Stephen Lloyd, Craig Gerard (story editor), Matthew Zinman (story editor), Dan Gregor (story editor), Doug Mand (story editor)
actors: Josh Radnor, Jason Segel, Cobie Smulders, Neil Patrick Harris
plot: Ted tries to choose a date for the Architect's Ball, an embarrassing Internet video could cost Marshall a new job, and Barney makes a bold move to prove to Nora that he's a changed man.
